name: Baomint Moisturizing Curl Defining Gel
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A concentrated, cream-based, healthy hair gel that elongates, moisturizes, and defines without dryness, crunch, or tackiness..Hair Type:Medium and Thick.Hair Texture:Curly and Coily.Hair Concerns:.Key Benefits:.Formulation:Gel.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Forget about dryness and white flakes or a super crunchy hold on your curls, this rich moisturizing formula provides a medium hold that freezes your curl pattern in place. The gentle, protective cast envelopes the hair while it dries, leaving soft, defined curls for days.
ingredients: -Prickly Pear Oil: Contains fats which work to improve softness and elasticity..-Pumpkin Seed Oil: Contains high amounts of zinc and vitamin E to address a flaky, irritated, and itchy scalp..-Sweet Almond Oil: Improves the shine and strength of your hair. ..Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (Fractionated Coconut Oil), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Opuntia Ficus Indica (Prickly Pear) Seed Oil, Phthalates Free Fragrance, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, Acrylates Copolymer, Polyquaternium,-11, Xanthan Gum, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Lavandula (Lavender) Spica Oil, Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Rake Leave In Conditioning Styler (sold separately) on sopping wet hair with your fingers as a moisture base to prep for styling..-Make sure your hair remains sopping wet throughout the styling process by using a spray bottle filled with water..-Grab a quarter-size amount and melt the Baomint Moisturizing Curl Defining Gel in your hands to warm up the product..-Apply in small sections with your fingers for kinkier hair textures (for more defined kinks and coils) and larger sections for curlier textures..-For frizz-free results, re-wet each section as you work through your hair to spread the product evenly with your fingers, making sure each strand is coated..-Allow your hair to air dry or diffuse with a handheld dryer. .-Alternatively, sit under a hooded dryer on the low heat setting until 85 to 95 percent dry and then allow to air dry the rest of the way. .-This product can also be used for twist-outs, braid-outs, roller sets, and more.                                                                                                                                                    .-Tip: Do not use on dry or damp hair and do not mix with the Baomint Moisturizing Curl Defining Cream (sold separately) since the gel is cream based and may cause it to lose its hold.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't expecting to like this gel when I got a free sample ages ago. It does still work over a leave-in but you will sacrifice the majority of the hold doing so. It definitely works best on its own and while following the directions on the jar.  I get a solid 3 days out of my style when using this, only dealing with mild flattening of my hair on the side I sleep on. It refreshes well and doesn't feel heavy on the scalp.

reviews.review_text: Having thick and very curly hair I am always seeking something that will help with the way my hair looks. Living in a very humid environment, such as Texas I was desperate to find something that doesn't make me look like Chewbacca. This cream made my curls stand out, defined, and frizz free. I received a lot of compliments using this product, even my dear friend who also has curly hair asked what it is that I've been using! Looks like she is out shopping for this product! It's a must have, perfect size for when I travel like vacations to Mexico or anywhere my hair may go wild and crazy. Especially if you tend to have dry hair, this helps give your hair some life and look amazing! I highly recommend this product! I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_text: This curl defining gel is great! I have type 4b or so coily/kinky hair and this product worked well. I first washed and deep conditioned with the baomint line of products. Upon coming out from the dryer my hair felt like it had a good hold, but there was no hard crunch. My hair also felt very moisturized. I really like the results I got from this whole line of products including this gel. I would highly recommend the baomint moisturizing curl defining gel. I will definitely purchase this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This medium-hold gel claims to create soft curls without the crunch, with organic ingredients that are vegan and cruelty-free. Hair must remain soaking wet while styling, which was pretty easy for me as I typically use my hair products after showering. This gel comes in a tub-like container instead of a typical tube, which really helps you get exactly how much you want to use. Plus, I love that there will be no waste as there is always a little bit that wonu2019t come out of the tube gels I use! The smell is not super overpowering and is more creamy than mint. The texture is thicker than my normal gel, so that took a little getting used to. Overall, I think this is great for super curly or kinky hair - I love the smell and I think if my hair was shorter it would be perfect for me. However, Iu2019ve let my curls grow out so they are a bit more loose now. Definitely give this a try if you have super curly hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is naturally curly/wavy (3A type if you know about curls) and varies between being a nice soft frizz ball or, at times, a more defined spiral. I struggle to find products that are strong enough to hold the frizz at bay while also leaving my hair touch-ably soft and defined. Pros about this curl defining gel are that it 100% helped tame the frizz, it left my hair feeling soft to the touch, and it helped keep my natural curls in place for about a day and a half without needing to add in extra product. Additional pros include no white cast left behind & no flaking! Cons would be the initial scent. I honestly would describe it as really strong wet bark.. like tree bark. It went away quickly though and did not leave any fragrance notes in my hair. The only other u201cconu201d, although more of a slight inconvenience, is that you MUST use the product on sopping wet hair. For me it just felt a bit stressful since I typically style my hair with leave-ins after Iu2019m out of the shower and on my damp hair. Instead, with this gel I needed to apply before I got out of the shower or I would have been dripping water everywhere. I do love it though and definitely recommend it!!

reviews.review_text: I was looking for a clean gel for my 3b/3c curls. I am white with very damaged, coarse, frizz-prone hair. I didn't follow the instructions, which said not to use a curl cream-- I just couldn't imagine not putting a curl cream into my frizzy hair (I used a curl cream not in this line). I did follow the part of the instructions that said to make sure your hair is sopping wet. I ended up with great definition and curls that bounced back for a full week. My hair wasn't sticky at all. By far the best gel I have found! The next time I wash my hair, I'll be brave and use it as directed, without curl cream. I want to try the whole line now.   A couple of reviews mentioned the strong smell. My experience was that it faded VERY quickly. I have tried other products, and it's been like throwing perfume into my hair. That's not how I would describe this product at all. The ingredients have naturally occurring odors, and they mostly fade by the time your hair is dry. The smell is strong when you open the jar, but that's about it.

I then tested it and kind of ran my fingers through it and combed it out and normally any other gel would leave flakes and make my hair feel gross but this product just combed right out with no flakes no dryness no grossness. I continue to restyle my hair the next few days with it and had no build up or any flaking or dryness. I used it on dry hair and I am going to try it on wet hair slicking it back. but if you are a person looking for a good gel for straight hair I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ll start by saying that i am Indian by birth. So my hair is curly but not curly like afro hair. I bought this product with a lot of hesitation because most pics and reviews were from people who had tight curls. The first time i used it i put a lot with the leave in so it weighed it down a bit but the definition was so good. Next time i used half the amount and man does my hair look bomb! Love love love it. This product can be used by anyone irrespective of ethnicity!!

reviews.review_title: Amazing gel for wash and go styles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this gel for wash and go styles as well as twist outs. It took a little time but I have figured out how to have an amazing wash and go. I use the leave in conditioner first, then apply the gel in small sections. APPLY THIS GEL WHILE YOUR HAIR IS SOPPING WET. It makes a difference. I promise. This is honestly the best gel I've ever used and I've been natural for the past ten years. This doesn't leave my hair crunchy or hard. I like how moisturizing it is but also how much definition I get. This is a summertime staple. Just try it. And listen to their instructions or watch their videos. It really helps.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST FOR TIGHTLY TEXTURED COILS!
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite curl defining cream now!!! Itu2019s so moisturizing but still gives me the perfect hold. I also love that it has the same scalp properties as the other products because I can feel the tingle on my scalp way after applying it!! My coils love it and I will keep buying over and over!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This gel is my ride or die for amazing texture and hold for my wash day. The trick is making sure your hair is dripping wet and making sure you wet the product in your hand before applying to the hair. I work this product in my hair in small sections after applying the leave in styler. I take my time and take the product through my whole entire head. I sandwich my hair between my hands when Iu2019m down to make sure itu2019s all smooth. Lastly I give it one heck of a shake. Now here comes the hard part....LEAVE IT ALONE UNTIL ITS DRY!!!!! Once your hard is dry it will leave a cast but DO NOT BREAK THE CAST! Let your hair naturally break the cast as the days go by. Your wash and go will last longer and so will the definition. If you break the cast on day one you will have a lot of fizz in no time.  If you donu2019t want day one hair because you donu2019t want to break the cast, do what I do and do your hair the night before. If you go to sleep with freshly dryed and styled hair when you wake up youu2019re already on day 2 hair without you having to mess with it. I love this gel so much I always keep 2 backups in my house!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3C ringlets, and am half black. After using this product I think it would work best for those that have type 4 curls. It weighs down the hair, and is also plyable. It was too heavy for my curls. I do not think this would work for a stretched out look for type 3 curls. Personally, I could not get past the smell. It's very strong and made my eyes water. Sort of like minty bubblegum band aids? It was so bad my husband told me to go wash it out and he was across the room. I was surprised that this product has so much mint in it as mint can be very drying on hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This would be a great product on its own. I have 3b/3a curls, and it didn't weigh my hair down and didn't have a strong cast. It has a creamy consistency and is very hydrating! I also have great volume on day two. I love the smell of these products! It's like a minty piu00f1a colada.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only gel I can use. It is amazing! Doesn't dry my hair and doesn't flake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This gel is amazing. It gives amazing definition and a nice medium hold which I love. My wash n go lasts all week with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Solid hold in my wash n gou2019s. I can easy get more than a week out of a style without the drying effect of traditional gels. Great ingredients and the gel cast breaks on its own and has never flaked. Layers very well over the Adwoa Leave-In styler.

reviews.review_title: Works okay, smell is mind-reelingly awful
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this, since I always read reviews before buying products from Sephora, and there were a lot of good ones. First of all, it's pretty thick for a gel. The first time I used it it weighed my hair down an insane amount. I cut the amount of gell I used in half, and that helped some, but it's still just not my jam. The cast was still really hard to scrunch out and I hated the texture it left. Secondly, and maybe most importantly, the smell is AWFUL. I read reviews saying the smell wasn't amazing, but I know a lot of that is personal preference, and many people can't handle much smell at all. Boy was I wrong. This stuff REEKS with a disgusting, overly processed, chemical perfume smell. It literally made me nauseous.  It DID help define my curls so I guess technically it did was its supposed to.... But at what cost?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can literally use this product alone and get the best wash and go ever! I love the way my curls instantly define once I apply it to my hair. Plus a little goes a long way with the product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is excellent!   The leave-in is too thick for my hair and the defining cream which is described as ideal for fine hair is awful for me and I have super fine coils.  Always a struggle finding something for my hair type. The gel described here says for medium to thick hair which I donu2019t have at all.  I used a nourishing oil on my hair first while very wet from the shower and then used just a finger tip sized amount of this gel over my curls using the u201cpraying-handsu201d technique to help form curls. I let air dry while I got dressed and finished with the diffuser.  Best. Curls. Ever.  So if the cream is too heavy for you try this gel. Even though it goes against the description. Maybe Sephora wrote it backwards by mistake?  Because that cream wouldnu2019t even dry in my hair.  Wet for hours. No matter how little I used.  Get this gel!  Amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this but the smell was awful and gave me a headache the entire time it was on my hair. I had to wash it out and restyle it. I have thick coarse hair and this just weighed it down. I followed the instructions as written on the product.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it, but not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product because I love the deep conditioner, shampoo, and leave in. But this left white flakes in my hair, no matter how wet my hair was. I did follow the instructionsu2014applied leave in to soaking wet hair, and then the gelu2014but no matter what, I still found white stuff on my hair and at the roots.  My hair is 4c, extremely dense, and low porosity, so maybe that's why.   Unfortunately, it's a no for me. If you're thinking about buying this, consider buying a mini size when they come out first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a combination of 3A, 3B, 3C and 4A hair. I'm also low porosity. This gel defined my curls but I've experienced better definition with other gels. Once my hair dried, my hair looked (and felt) extremely dry. No shine at all. I used the leave in and applied on soaking wet hair like the instructions said. I will be returning this. However, I do like the shampoo. But this gel? It's a no for me. I think it has something to do with the Carbomer ingredient that's in here. It's an ingredient that can dry your hair out.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product that I ever used from this company, and I will definitely be buying more. I have 3b curls with some slight texture too. I must say that I only used this one product to style my hair (which I never do). I split my hair into four sections and started w/ a small amount raking into my curls, and surprisingly it was enough. It came out great, and I was very happy with the results. Shocked, was more like it.

reviews.review_title: I wanted it to work, but...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell, consistency and how it did not irritate my scalp like many gels do, but it lacked hold and shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product, performs well, freezes my 4a/4b curl pattern. Itu2019s the real deal.

reviews.review_title: The truth for kinky curly hair types
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So Iu2019ve been on the search for last 3 weeks for a curl  gel that will define my curls. Iu2019ve been wearing wigs for almost a year and just need a breather. One use of this product and Iu2019m so in love!!! My hair has held its curl for 4 days now. I will be purchasing the whole line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product exceeded my expectations. Added to my holy grail line up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried to deny it. I've tried to dupe it. But I have to finally admit that this is the best gel I've ever used on my 4a/4b hair and it is worth every single penny. At first I didn't get how good this was, but then I strayed to other cheaper options which only forced me to admit that this gel is my HOLY GRAIL. Use it on soaking wet hair and you can't go wrong. It practically turns into water in my hair and my hair just drinks it up. The only product that gives me real definition. This is the TRUTH

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been experimenting with hair products for the last four years of my natural hair journey. I canu2019t believe it, but Iu2019ve finally found a hair care line that works perfectly with my hair! This gel in particular is everything. It tames my frizz without a gel like crunch. My locks remain super soft and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful! I love the definition and vibrancy. Itu2019s not crunchy but a nice cast. Smells good. Holds for over a week. A little goes a long way. Iu2019ve been making samples and giving them to others as a gift. Thatu2019s how much I love this brand. The only product I havenu2019t tried is the cream. The shampoo, styler, deep conditioner and gel are my holy grail.

reviews.review_title: My Wash n Gos Look So Good Now!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Who knew my 'wash n go's could be so perfect? The curl defining gel is hands down my favorite product of 2020. I apply a small amount to my damp hair and my curls just pop and stay in place. No crunch or flakes and it doesn't dry my hair so my hair is still hydrated and happy! Hurry up and grab  it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gel is for a lack of a better word, AMAZING! It defines my 4C hair perfectly, giving it a flexible hold without being crunchy or flaky once dried. Wash n goes are a breeze with this gel and are now my go to style that actually lasts an entire week. To receive optimum results, follow their instructions to the letter; believe me it's worth it.  The entire adwoa beauty line is phenomenal! I have used many other natural hair lines that claim to be perfect for 4C hair; they claim to define curls, moisturize, etc., but just end up falling short of their claims. I can honestly say that adwoa beauty delivers on all their promises, and they do it with high-quality, clean ingredients; nothing bad for your hair to be found here.  I now only use adwoa beauty in my hair! Try it, you'll love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite product in the line. It's a weird texture and you have to use it the way they show you or else it will flake. But once you learn how to use it you literally cannot go back to regular gel. Besides defining my curls and my wash n go's lasting the full week, the biggest difference I notice with this gel from other gels is that my hair is not dry feeling on days 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 or 7. It feel soft and moisturized like I used a cream.I can use gel without it being drying. And I live in the South so the glycerin doesn't bother me at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not much of a gel person,  but I like a good moisturizing gel. This gel is thick, but at the same time, not heavy. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product gave me my first wash n go. I did not think it was possible for my 4c hair to be so defined.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: for years I've tried to achieve the wash n go hairstyle with no success. Once I discovered this line, there was no turning back my wash n go's have always been on point without fail. If you follow the directions, you too can be fly in time for summer. I  now have the ENTIRE collection. adwoa beauty products are the TRUTH and the smell is simply divine in my humble opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this product when I was growing out a short haircut. I have 4b/c hair and this was the only product that kept my curls defined for a wash and go without too much styling effort. They have great tutorial videos and recommend using on soaking wet hair. The smell is also really nice, I always get compliments on it.

reviews.review_title: The Best Natural Hiar Line. Period
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gel for my wash n go's! I wear the style for a full week. The key to using this product is to follow the instructions, on super wet hair, raking through in small sections and respraying with water as you go. Allowing the product to fully dry will also help it hold better. Note: Adwoa products are NOT designed to give you a super strong hold. If that's what you need, then this gel is not it.  I sit under a hooded dryer for 45 minutes and then let it air dry the rest of the way. If you don't follow the instructions it will not work because it is not like regular clear gels (filled with drying alcohols). Like with all Adwoa Beauty products, applying when wet is key but especially the gel. Watch her tutorials and try the product, you will LOVE it! I have done strictly wash n go's for the past 2 years with it and my hair has grown like crazy. I have 4A (nape area),B (front and sides area) and C (crown area) textures. These products are truly the real deal, I cannot imagine anyone not finding SOMETHING they like in this line for natural hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my curls defined, stretched, and moisturized without being weighed down. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: a gel that MOISTURIZES we love to see it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS GEL! It works so well with my 4a-b coily/low porosity hair. I use water to help work in the product and its great for twist-outs. I havent tried it yet for a wash n go because im not usually into wash n gos but now that my hair is completely curly (I went natural in 2017) I cant wait to try it!

reviews.review_title: WASH & GO FOR KINKY HAIR FINALLY!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before -- I never thought a wash & go was for me. Until ... this bad boy hit my hair after an amazing deep conditioning and leave in experience. THIS IS IT!! TWo years ago this product showed me what a true wash and go was but also changed how I looked and embraced my true natural kinky curl pattern. For the first time in being natural for years, I had the curls I used to buy wigs for or wished except this was on my hair. This gel changed my entire life and also helped me focus more time on exercising and running than spending 2308408 hours on my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product. I canu2019t wait to get the Leave In styler, shampoo, and conditioner!!! It holds definition and keeps the product up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is unlike other gels I've used. My favorite part about it is that you can feel it working as you rake it through your hair. It coats strands marvelously, and moisturizes like a conditioner. I absolutely adore this unique product for my dense, coily 43c hair. I'd recommend it without hesitation to anyone with similar hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: The real deal! It holds but doesnu2019t make curls dry!  Follow the instructions for best results. Nice firm curls!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gel isnu2019t your typical gel. It holds your curls in place for a perfect wash n go no doubt but without the dryness and hard crunch most gels have. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only gel that has allowed my 4b/4c hair to achieve a wash and go. Follow the directions because itu2019s crucial for the best results. Hair has to be soaking wet for the best definition and hold. Get this ASAP
